page.title: 11THE RIVER CLAW
page.content: The{River Claw}is a natural flowing river that flows through Clawton {village.}We went to the{River Claw}to look at its{wildlife. The{River Claw}starts at{Claw Moor plantation and flows into the{River {Tamar}which flows into the sea at {Marsland Mouth. There are many varieties of{flowers and{plants}including{Marigold,Water {lily,daisy,Doc leaf}and{Duck weed}that can be found in and around the{River {Claw. The insects can be amazing like the {red}dragonfly surpposed to be {poisonous}and the Dung-fly that crowd around cowpats.We found{animals}like a {Mink}that had made its nest on the bank and the cows that are very {curious. Poeple do alot of{fishing}on the {River Claw.They}fish for mainly{Trout.
